sentences.english: The treaty fixed the permitted ratio of government debt-to-GDP at 60 percent.
sentences.chinese: 条约规定政府债务率最高可为60%。

sentences.english: Australia invoked the treaty to come to our defense.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚援引同盟条约来保卫我们。

sentences.english: The Treaty of Amity and Cooperation in Southeast Asia is a good lesson for them.
sentences.chinese: 东南亚国家的友好合作条约为他们建立了一个好榜样。

sentences.english: One of our largest non-profit clients is Pact.
sentences.chinese: 我们最大的一个非盈利性的客户是条约。

sentences.english: A big sticking point will be Merkel's insistence on renegotiating the Lisbon treaty.
sentences.chinese: 目前的关键在于默克尔坚持要修订里斯本条约。

sentences.english: A common testing methodology is to use the think-aloud protocol.
sentences.chinese: 一个通常使用的方法是自言自语条约。

sentences.english: Many countries have acceded to the treaty.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家已加入了那个条约。

sentences.english: What is the International Environmental Treaty-making System and What are its Objectives?
sentences.chinese: 国际环境条约的制定系统与其目的为何？

sentences.english: The right to amend this Privacy and interpretation of treaties belong to the Company.
sentences.chinese: 本隐私条约的修改权和解释权属于本公司。

sentences.english: The Soviet-German non-aggression treaty smashed this plot.
sentences.chinese: 这种阴谋，被苏德互不侵犯条约击破了。

sentences.english: One of the first conditions as a result of the Armistice was the complete abrogation of the treaty.
sentences.chinese: 第一个条件，由于停战协定的，是完全废除该条约。

sentences.english: What is the overall goal of the treaty ?
sentences.chinese: 该条约的总体目标是什么？

sentences.english: He landed with a guard of 500 men to sign the treaty.
sentences.chinese: 他偕同500人的警卫队一起登陆，签订条约。

sentences.english: But first it will have to ratify the treaty.
sentences.chinese: 但是首先美国必须批准该条约。

sentences.english: They all signed "mutual assistance" pacts making them virtual protectorates of the Soviet Union.
sentences.chinese: 他们都签署了使自己几乎受制于苏联的“互惠条约”。
